Interface FTPOperationImpl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FTPOperation

    Interface for FTPOperation class.

    Andrew Malitchuk

                                               throws IOException
        Get available information of chosen file in remote server.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path of file on which we want get information on remote ftp server
        Returns:
        FTPFile-object of chosen file
        Throws:
        IOException - if an input or output exception occurred

      • getListOfFiles

        List<org.apache.commons.net.ftp.FTPFile> getListOfFiles(String dirPath)
                                                 throws IOException
        Gets all included sub files and subdirectories of chosen directory
        Parameters:
        dirPath - the path of directory in remote ftp server of which its going to get the list of included subfiles and directories
        Returns:
        the list of subfiles and directories of chosen directory
        Throws:
        IOException - if an input or output exception occurred

      • remove

        void remove(List<String> curFilesListPath,
            String destPath)
     throws IOException
        Remove multiple files between two remote directories
        Parameters:
        curFilesListPath - the list of the files path which are going to be renamed or removed in remote File System
        destPath - the path of destination directory in remote File System
        Throws:
        IOException - if an input or output exception occurred

      • rename

        void rename(String oldPath,
            String newPath)
     throws IOException
        Rename a remote file. Also can be used for remove single remote file.
        Parameters:
        oldPath - an old path/name of file which is going to be renamed or removed in remote File System
        newPath - a new path/name of file in remote File System
        Throws:
        IOException - if an input or output exception occurred

      • uploadDirectory

        void uploadDirectory(String remoteDirPath,
                     String localParentDirPath,
                     String remoteParentDirPath)
              throws IOException
        Uploading local directory with all sub files and subdirectories to ftp server
        Parameters:
        remoteDirPath - the path of destination directory of ftp server
        localParentDirPath - the path of local directory which is going to be uploaded with all included subfiles and directories
        remoteParentDirPath - the path of remote destination directory on the ftp server
        Throws:
        IOException - if an input or output exception occurred

      • uploadFile

        void uploadFile(String localFilePath,
                String remoteFilePath,
                String remoteDirPath)
         throws Exception
        Uploading single local file to remote ftp server with certain destination parent directory path. In this method remoteFilePath parameter may be relative path.
        Parameters:
        localFilePath - the path of the local file for uploading
        remoteFilePath - new path/name of the file in remote directory
        remoteDirPath - the path of destination directory of ftp server
        Throws:
        Exception - if an input or output exception occurred

      • uploadFile

        boolean uploadFile(String localFilePath,
                   String remoteFilePath)
            throws IOException
        Uploading single local file to remote ftp server without certain destination parent directory path. In this method remoteFilePath parameter must to be full path to file
        Parameters:
        localFilePath - the path of the local file for uploading
        remoteFilePath - new path/name of the file in remote directory
        Returns:
        true if successfully completed, false if not
        Throws:
        IOException - if an input or output exception occurred

      • uploadFile

        void uploadFile(List<File> localFilePathsList,
                String remoteDirPath)
         throws IOException,
                FileNotFoundException
        Uploading multiple files to certain directory path of ftp server.
        Parameters:
        localFilePathsList - the list of files path for multiple uploading
        remoteDirPath - the path of destination directory of ftp server
        Throws:
        IOException - if an input or output exception occurred
        FileNotFoundException - if file not found exception occurred
